Details:
* Password required during OS provisioning for root users. 
* Length must be at least 8 characters and must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\") or backslashes (\\). ``,``,``-``,``'``,``"``, or ``\\``.
Password required for PostgreSQL database. Length must be at least 8 characters and must contain only alphanumeric characters (letters and numbers).
Username for BMC (idrac) access. The same credentials must be used across all servers.
Password required for BMC (idrac) access. Length must be at least 3 characters and must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\") or backslashes (\\).

Mandatory or Optional:
Optional

.. note:: If there is a switch connected to the cluster, this paramater becomes mandatory.
Details: Non-admin SNMPv3 credentials for the PXE switch. If multiple switches are provided, use the same credentials for all switches.

Mandatory or Optional:
Optional

.. note:: If there is a switch connected to the cluster, this paramater becomes mandatory.
Details: Password required for SNMPv3 access to the PXE switch. Must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), or double quotes (\\\").
Password required for setting up the Pulp container. Length must be at least 8 characters and must not contain commas (,), hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\") or backslashes (\\).
Username for the Dockerhub account. This will be used for Docker login.
Password for Dockerhub account. Must be at least 8 characters long and can contain letters, numbers, and special characters.
Password for the Slurm database. SlurmDB password must not contain special characters like hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\") or backslashes (\\).
Password for LDAP Directory Manager. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\"), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\\).
Password for Kerberos admin in FreeIPA. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\"), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\\).
Username for OpenLDAP database admin. Must not contain semicolons (;), square brackets ([]), or backticks (`).
Password for OpenLDAP database admin. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\"), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\\).
Username for OpenLDAP configuration admin. Must not contain semicolons (;), square brackets ([]), or backticks (`).
Password for OpenLDAP configuration admin. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\"), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\\).
Password for OpenLDAP monitor admin. Must not contain hyphens (-), single quotes ('), double quotes (\"), at symbols (@), or backslashes (\\).
